name: Unstoppable (itch)
description:
This is my entry for MusicJam2018.  

It's a rhythm game based on the dancing dude from Sasquatch music festival 2009. 

Here's the video for reference.

Default controls are A, S, D, F, from left to right. You can change them in the menu.

Please the crowd to win - there's a crowd pleasure meter in the top left to help you out. It could be a tough crowd though, so don't be afraid to try again. 

I named it after the song in the video.

Font is from Kenny.nl.

Music is from Kevin MacLeod.

Artwork is all my own.
